title: 100 Proof: The Next Big NFT Genre, A Case For Generative Art, & Collector Strategy with Todd Goldberg
description: Tech entrepreneur, investor, NFT collector, and Curated co-founder Todd Goldberg joins Kevin Rose and Derek Edwards Schloss for this edition of 100 Proof. Here, they discuss collector strategies in a crypto bear market, the enduring allure of generative art, the dangers of maximalism, the next big NFT genre, and much more.
dc:creator: Kevin Rose
